title: RP
body: I created a new account , when do I get the free 400 RP you are supposed to start with? what level do I get it?

replies.body:
Around the time that hextech crafting debuted, we adjusted the level 3 rewards to be more in tune with the new crafting system! Instead of receiving 400 RP at level 3, we adjusted it so that you will now be given a free hextech chest. 

You can go over all the details of why we made this change on the post we made [**here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ZGErnvY4-hextech-crafting-new-player-chests-to-replace-400-rp).
